In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapons [[Summit Shaper]] ([[Sword]]) and the 5-star weapon [[Skyward Atlas]] ([[Catalyst]]) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

In this event wish, 4-star weapons [[Favonius Sword]] ([[Sword]]), [[Favonius Greatsword]] ([[Claymore]]), [[Favonius Lance]] ([[Polearm]]), [[Sacrificial Fragments]] ([[Catalyst]]), and [[The Stringless]] ([[Bow]]) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapon will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
